My Work

Some of my favorite projects:

Oregon PERS

Web development for the Oregon Public Employees Retirement System, an Oregon state agency. Contributions including: a customized Javascript carousel that pulls data from a Microsoft SharePoint API, custom CSS, semantic HTML and accessibility enhancements, and migration of hundreds of pages from their old site to their new primary external site, which provides resources and support for hundreds of thousands of PERS members.

Oregon.gov/PERS

Chris Korsak Photography Portfolio & Blog

Gatsby JS (React) photography portfolio. Migration of 60 blog posts from Squarespace to a custom portfolio site that features responsive galleries and an image lightbox, a Markdown blog, and a contact form that allows a submission without a page refresh. Google Chrome lightbox performance score improved from a '22' rating on Squarespace to a '97' rating with this custom site. I'm also proud of the photography!

Chris Korsak Photography

Collab Lab: Smart Shopping List

React, Firebase, & Tailwind smart shopping list app that learns your buying habits. I helped build this with three other talented developers at The Collab Lab.

Live Site | Github

Solstice Food Photography

Portfolio & landing page for Solstice Food Photography. JavaScript image gallery lightbox. Styled with Sass. Fully responsive site, including a responsive menu.

Live Site

Frontend Mentor Projects

I have solved a number of projects on the platform called Frontend Mentor. Check out my work and compare it to the original design specs!

My Frontend Mentor Profile

Dave Cesana

Landing page for Dave Cesana, Integral Life Coach. Fully responsive site, including a JavaScript animated menu. I also created all photography for the site.

Live Site
